pageContext.claim: “Very simply, you will decide whether your children will grow up in a socialist country or whether they will grow up in a free country. And I will you this, uh, socialist is just the beginning for these people. These people wanna go further than socialism. They wanna go into a communistic form of government.”
pageContext.analysis: This is crazy rhetoric. The election of two Democratic senators, resulting in a 50-50 tie in the Senate, would not make the United States a "socialist" country or lead to a "communistic" government.
